description: Built a comprehensive ERP system for hardware stores, managing all aspects of business operations from client management to billing and transportation.
achievements: Built an ERP system to manage clients, sales, purchases, suppliers, stock, transportation, and billing for hardware stores
Used MySQL for database management, ensuring reliable and efficient data storage
Developed the backend using Node.js, providing a robust and scalable server-side application and provided a flexible model adaptable to different companies
Implemented the frontend using Vanilla JavaScript and Bootstrap, creating a user-friendly and responsive interface
Automated processes that saved over $1000 per month per store in human resource costs
The ERP was adopted by 12 companies across Lima, enhancing their operational efficiency
